After taking a break earlier this year, I am excited to announce that I am officially looking for my next career adventure, interviewing now with the goal of beginning with a company in early CYQ3 this year (August - September preferred).

For prospective employers, I have put together a reverse job posting, using the approach Iâ€™ve seen most recently used by the amazing Julie Pagano (hire her!). I hope this format will prove useful for folks who want to know a little bit more about me than whatâ€™s contained within my resume.
